headline: Sanofi Tumbles After Board Shockingly Ousts CEO Paul Hudson
summary: Sanofi stock skidded Thursday after the pharma giant's board ousted Paul Hudson as CEO, replacing him with Merck KGaA's Belen Garijo.

raw.headline: Sanofi Tumbles After Board Shockingly Ousts CEO Paul Hudson
raw.summary: Sanofi stock skidded Thursday after the pharma giant's board ousted Paul Hudson as CEO, replacing him with Merck KGaA's Belen Garijo.

headline: Will Eylea Sales Decline Weigh on REGN's Top Line in 2026?
summary: Regeneron foresees further Eylea decline in 2026 as biosimilars loom, but Eylea HD, Dupixent and Libtayo aim to steady revenues.

raw.headline: Will Eylea Sales Decline Weigh on REGN's Top Line in 2026?
raw.summary: Regeneron foresees further Eylea decline in 2026 as biosimilars loom, but Eylea HD, Dupixent and Libtayo aim to steady revenues.

headline: Sanofi Shares Fall After CEO Change
summary: Sanofi shares fell after the company said Belen Garijo, the chief executive of Germany’s Merck KGaA, would succeed Paul Hudson as CEO after its board decided not to renew his mandate.

raw.headline: Sanofi Shares Fall After CEO Change
raw.summary: Sanofi shares fell after the company said Belen Garijo, the chief executive of Germany’s Merck KGaA, would succeed Paul Hudson as CEO after its board decided not to renew his mandate.
